title: d.c. conductor insulation colours
fullText:
All d.c. negative conductors should be identified by black or yellow insulation.
If the boat is also equipped with an a.c. electrical system which may use black conductor insulation, yellow insulation shall be used for d.c. negative conductors of the d.c. system. Black or yellow insulation shall not be used for d.c. positive conductors.
Means of identification other than colour for d.c. positive conductors is permitted if properly identified on the wiring diagram of the electrical system(s) of the boat.
